code_value:
ets_th1

There is a message for you Andrew. Here you are.


ets_th2

Oh no, not again! I am always making the same mistake.


ets_th3

Please do come and stay with us again next time you are here in Shanghai.


ets_th4

Whatever you do, you mustn't touch that switch!
